encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This is fine--only minor tidying needed. META: update Berlin image link (https://berlpap.smb.museum/04332/); correct the author/work information and digital identifiers, and move the passage info (Exodus 6.6-7; Deuteronomy 7.9) to the passage area; Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575). TEXT: remove space before .1 in r.2; add [.?] to end or r.7; dot xi in r.8 and change accent on προς to grave; accent δὲ in r.9; remove spaces on either side of κεινη in r.10 and .1 in r.11; change aspirate on ἀπό in v.6; add space before και in v.7 and add accent, also articulate ὅτι in v.7; add scribal grave over omega in v.8; move [.?] to immediately after |alt| tags in v.8; add .1 before sigma in v.9.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - This is fine--only minor tidying needed. TEXT: remove space before .1 in r.2; add [.?] to end or r.7; dot xi in r.8 and change accent on προς to grave; accent δὲ in r.9; remove spaces on either side of κεινη in r.10 and .1 in r.11; change aspirate on ἀπό in v.6; add space before και in v.7 and add accent, also articulate ὅτι in v.7; add scribal grave over omega in v.8; move [.?] to immediately after |alt| tags in v.8; add .1 before sigma in v.9.
